item.title: EP 692 - 3rd Anniversary Special: The Lost Dead Rabbit Segment, And My Favorite Topic I've Never Covered!
item.itunes:title: 3rd Anniversary Special - The Lost Dead Rabbit Segment, And My Favorite Topic I've Never Covered
item.description:
Today is the 3rd Anniversary of Dead Rabbit Radio!

 

Patreon 

https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

MERCH STORE!!!

https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

Dual Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

"As Above" Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

“Alien Flyer” By TVP VT U

https://imgur.com/gallery/aPN1Fnw

 

 

Links:

EP 135 - Bonus Episode: Behind The Scenes Of Dead Rabbit Radio

https://deadrabbitradio.libsyn.com/ep-135-bonus-episode-behind-the-scenes-of-dead-rabbit-radio

 

EP 149 - America's Dyaltov Pass: The Yuba County 5

https://deadrabbitradio.libsyn.com/ep-149-americas-dyaltov-pass-the-yuba-county-5

 

EP 86 - The Bigfoot Massacre

https://deadrabbitradio.libsyn.com/ep-86-the-bigfoot-massacre

 

EP 14 - Daydreamin' (Home Invasion episode)

https://deadrabbitradio.libsyn.com/ep-14-daydreamin

 

EP 244 - Three Aliens, Six Humans, and One Bear

https://deadrabbitradio.libsyn.com/ep-244-three-aliens-six-humans-and-one-bear

 

EP 422 - The Unthinkable Madness At The Kitchen Table

https://deadrabbitradio.libsyn.com/ep-422-the-unthinkable-madness-at-the-kitchen-table

 

EP 667 - Trees Are Aliens (Meth Starbucks episode)

https://deadrabbitradio.libsyn.com/ep-667-trees-are-aliens

 

EP 274 - The Sheep Slayer

https://deadrabbitradio.libsyn.com/ep-274-the-sheep-slayer

 

EP 178 - Does Bigfoot Come From Another Dimension?

https://deadrabbitradio.libsyn.com/ep-178-does-bigfoot-come-from-another-dimension

 

EP 254 - The Bigfoot Wears Prada: When Cryptids Wear Clothes

https://deadrabbitradio.libsyn.com/ep-254-the-bigfoot-wears-prada-when-cryptids-wear-clothes

 

EP 87 - The Mormon Bigfoot (Vril episode)

https://deadrabbitradio.libsyn.com/ep-87-the-mormon-bigfoot

 

EP 26 - Don't Lose Your Head! (Wedge Of Aiud episode)

https://deadrabbitradio.libsyn.com/ep-26-dont-lose-your-head

 

EP 101 - The 1490 Meteor Event (Cooper Family Photo episode)

https://deadrabbitradio.libsyn.com/ep-101-the-1490-meteor-event

 

EP 60 - The Conformers: Are [REDACTED] Or Is It Just [REDACTED]

https://deadrabbitradio.libsyn.com/ep-60-the-conformers-are-redacted-or-is-it-just-redacted

 

EP 609 - Did An Alien Visit My Home Two Weeks Ago?!? (Conformers Return episode)

https://deadrabbitradio.libsyn.com/ep-609-did-an-alien-visit-my-home-two-weeks-ago

 

EP 202 - Erratas: The Last Episode Of Dead Rabbit Radio?!?!

https://deadrabbitradio.libsyn.com/ep-202-erratas-the-last-episode-of-dead-rabbit-radio

 

Ep 661 - Hillary Clinton's Shapeshifting Slacks From Outer Space!

https://deadrabbitradio.libsyn.com/ep-661-hillary-clintons-shapeshifting-slacks-from-outer-space

 

EP 69 - Solar Plexus Clown Gliders

https://deadrabbitradio.libsyn.com/ep-69-solar-plexus-clown-gliders

 

Aluminum Man Music Video

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UCrsPqXk38I&ab_channel=AluminumMan

 

Jonty Bravery: Teenager who threw six-year-old boy from Tate Modern jailed for life

https://www.independent.co.uk/news/uk/crime/jonty-bravery-jailed-attempted-murder-boy-tate-modern-a9587086.html

 

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Music By Dr. Huxxxtable

Rabbitron 3000 created by Eerbud

Thanks to Chris K, Founder Of The Golden Rabbit Brigade

Dead Rabbit Archivist Some Weirdo On Twitter AKA Jack

YouTube Champ Stewart Meatball

The Haunted Mic Arm provided by Chyme Chili

Pintrest https://www.pinterest.com/basque5150/jason-carpenter-hood-river/

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @DeadRabbitRadio

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@deadrabbitradio

 

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018 - 2021
